评论详情: I purchased this for a last minute Halloween costume and figured it might be a throwaway item that I wore once. I was pleasantly surprised with the quality and fit. It's a very well made garment and it looked great on. If anything I might say it possibly ran a little large. Depending on the look you're going for. I'm definitely keeping it in realize it's versatile and I can wear it for a couple of different things. I can easily convert it from a Renaissance faire garment to a goth look by pinning and adjusting the length of the skirt. I usually wear a 16w and I think I bought a 2X if I'm not mistaken. The 2X great but I think I probably could have gotten a 1X and been happy.
I got so many compliments. Wore with a corset and hoop skirt. I’m tall and it fit great.
Love the color and the fabic. Reasonably priced made it a winner for me, purchased in several colors.
Very well sewn and beautiful soft material. Thickness is perfect. Used as a layering piece for Halloween costume. Love it!

Out of the package, I thought this dress looked killer. It was very wrinkly, but I was trying to put together a Saloon girl costume. Everything about it was perfect, except the length. I am a 6 foot tall woman, and this easily touched the floor. Because of this, I had to return, as I needed to be mobile for my event. I ended up renting a costume, but this dress looked better. I just wish it was a normal length. Other than that, it fit well, was a true 2X. Maybe you could get away with it by wearing heels?
Super pretty and I got a lot of compliments. Very heavy dress though.
True to size. It was airy but not see-through. Comfortable to wear all day. And machine washable

This is absolutely gorgeous, its a little bit large, but still true to size. However, it is completely made for persons who are 6 feet tall and live their lives in high heels. I'm 5'3", this actually pools by a few inches at my feet. However, this is not a problem as (like the little skirt hikes present in my photo) I will be installing hook and eye catches at hem and waist so that I can hike the skirt in front, which gathers enough that I don't trip on stairs. I want like five more. Very comfortable, though keep in mind the type of fabric is a little thin and makes some noise when moving. I had not ironed or tossed into the dryer when putting it on, so its also very wrinkly.

Perfect for my Renaissance outfit! I added a skirt on top for extra layering, which gave it a great period look. I absolutely adore the sleeves—they’re beautifully detailed and really elevate the whole outfit. Got so many compliments!

I was shocked how big this dress is. Normally when I order anything that comes from the east, it runs so tiny so I ordered the 3x which I normally do. And this thing is just massive. It did not look good because it was way too big. That being said, it is a very nice dress, the Deep green is a beautiful color, and the dress is very well constructed. I have some other dresses to try for my costume but if they don't work out I may come back and order this dress but only in a smaller size.
I dance with RI DANCING WITCHES and this dress fits and moves perfectly.
Not cheap feeling or looking
I just got this in burnt orange and I absolutely LOVE it! Comfy, sexy, flattering; what else can I say??!! And the price is unbelievable!
Love it, perfect for plus size and your ren fair needs

Wore in a play (color in photo is because of stage lights — it’s actually a beautiful rich teal / jewel tone) and wished I had a reason and space to keep it. High-quality material, generously cut (long enough for me and I’m 6’1”). Could have gone a size smaller overall, but I didn’t want to take a chance on length. Incredible dress for the price.

Amazing dress… a lot of dress I’d recommend a long petti underneath..  but if your like me 5’3” and 220 lbs go with the L/XL the larger dress will be to long and way to big… I had to return the first one and size down

Bought for a ren faire and it was so comfortable. Some of the hems had threads and trailing edges and frayed a bit over the course of the day, but I just trimmed them when I saw them and none of them were too bad. I might resew the ends. I love the trailing sleeves! Got lots of compliments

Wore this to the ren Faire. It was very comfortable and light, great for summer heat and humidity. It fit true to size and just brushed the ground on me, I’m 5’6” - had to hitch it up going up the hills so I might have to hem it a bit before next time. I got a lot of complements. The color is more of a peacock blue than a deep green, still pretty. The quality is great, good stitching, opaque material - it is a slippery type material which I didn’t expect but it was fine. Threw it in the dryer for a few minutes to get the wrinkles out from shipping. The waste is very elastic and forgiving, lots of material for flowy-ness. Can be worn above shoulders to cover a bra. I’d love to see this dress with the drape a complementary color to break it up a bit.

This is large but comfy and definitely gives off renaissance vibes. I would say fit wise this dress runs bigger. I got the off white/ivory in a 2XL/3xl (and I weight about 305lbs 5’3”). I usually wear a 3xl because I like to be flowy but a 1xl is usually just right but tight fit for me. I think with this dress I could have sized down and been ok (for me I have large hips/stomach and like B bust). This dress is about half a foot too long on me. Overall I think this is awesome and I would buy again. Looks wonderful just had to pin it up a little.
Im a big girl .this fit true to size and was very comfortable. I wore it with a corset but you could style it however you want. Probably going to buy it in a different color.

I bought the xl-2xl because I wanted to make sure it fit, I definitely could have gone a size smaller. Its 3 inches too long, I just ordered a crinoline to go under and my only problem will be solved it also is lined and not see through! I am an 18 and 5' 5". I am wearing it to a Renaissance faire!! I would definitely recommend!

This dress is so fun and easy to wear. I plan to add a corset with it, but it looks very nice alone. I love that this dress hides my postpartum belly and will still fit when I'm back to my normal size (6-8).

评论概述: The size is right but the length is made for some 6 feet tall
评论详情: Length incredibly too long
